about_the_game:
In a world ravaged by a catastrophic war, you are akin to a deity with the power to shape the future. In this post-apocalyptic top-down god game, you will embark on a journey to restore balance to the world and lead your followers to a new era of prosperity. With intuitive and simple gameplay mechanics, you will wield the power of creation and destruction, influencing the environment and molding it to your will.

You will encounter diverse factions, each with their own beliefs, goals, and desires. You must navigate the treacherous political landscape, making strategic alliances and negotiating with other factions to achieve your goals. Your decisions will determine the fate of your followers and the world they inhabit. Will you lead them to a new golden age, or will you watch as they crumble in the face of adversity?

This game combines elements of strategy, city-building, and resource management to offer a unique gaming experience. High quality hand-drawn graphics will make you feel like you are truly in a world that has been forever changed. So grab your controller, harness your godly powers, and get ready to write your own story in the post-apocalyptic world of Neo Citizen.

Features

  • Top-down tile-based auto-generated dungeon map
  • Interact with the world through your followers
  • Explore rooms and find resources, while avoiding dangers
  • Expand your domain, build doors and turrets to keep dangers out
  • Exploit your followers to construct and operate machinery
  • Appease factions and create trade relationships
  • Eventually revive yourself so you may act in the world again

content_descriptors.notes: In this game, characters may use swear words at times. And the player, during the game, has to kill animals to survive or kill zombies to defend the town.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP, Windows Vista, 7, 8, 10 or newer
  • Processor: Dual Core CPU 2.0 Ghz or better
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 3000 GPH / AMD HD 5450 / Nvidia 9400 GT
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: Neo Citizen - Prologue - A management and strategic game in which you will have to manage your resources to the best of your ability. Make connections with the inhabitants, improve the infrastructure and defend yourself from the dangers of a hostile and corrupt world.
